txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Ruffled feathers from the gore-crows. Bring the feathers to Frideric the Elder at Ost Guruth.
'More symbols of courage for my beleaguered people. You are proving yourself a valued ally.\n\n'Thank you.'
'Courage can be found in conquering fears and my people fear the crebain as portent of evil. But if they conquer that fear, they will be better armed. Can you help?'
Frideric the Elder at Ost Guruth desires ruffled feathers from the crebain found throughout the central and eastern Lone-lands.
Deliver the ruffled feathers to Frideric the Elder at Ost Guruth
You accepted a task from Frideric the Elder to acquire ruffled feathers from the crebain in the central and eastern Lone-lands. You can find Frideric the Elder within Ost Guruth.
Wanted: Ruffled feathers from the gore-crows.
